00025 sleep(1);
00026 require '../../../sysconfig.inc.php';
00027 
00028 header('Content-type: text/javascript');
00029 // get search value
00030 if (isset($_POST['inputSearchVal'])) {
00031     $searchVal = $dbs->escape_string(urldecode(trim($_POST['inputSearchVal'])));
00032 } else {
00033     exit();
00034 }
00035 // query to database
00036 $member_q = $dbs->query("SELECT member_id, member_name
00037     FROM member WHERE member_id LIKE '%$searchVal%' OR member_name LIKE '%$searchVal%' LIMIT 5");
00038 if ($member_q->num_rows < 1) {
00039     exit('NO DATA FOUND');
00040 }
00041 $json_array = array();
00042 // loop data
00043 while ($member_d = $member_q->fetch_row()) {
00044     $json_array[] = $member_d[0].' &lt;'.$member_d[1].'&gt;';
00045 }
00046 // encode to JSON array
00047 if (!function_exists('json_encode')) {
00048     die('ERROR! JSON library is not installed in PHP');
00049 }
00050 echo json_encode($json_array);
00051 ?>
